News.headline: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v FC Halifax Town
News.page_title: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v FC Halifax Town
News.URL_keywords: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v FC Halifax Town
News.short_description: A preview of the Daggers Emirates FA Cup first round fixture against FC Halifax Town on Saturday.
News.description:
The Daggers will be hoping to make it to the second round of the F.A cup as they face lower league opposition in the second successive round.

Halifax Town currently sit fifth in the Vanarama National League North and beat Harrogate to get to this stage of the cup.

Previous 5 Results

Daggers

Forest Green 1-1 Daggers
Daggers 1-0 Aldershot
Daggers 1-1 Macclesfield
Daggers 3-1 Wealdstone (FA Cup)
Eastleigh 0-1 Daggers

Halifax Town
Halifax 1-3 Brackley
Halifax 3-1 United of Manchester
Boston 1-4 Halifax
Harrogate 0-2 Halifax (FA Cup)
Gloucester 0-2 Halifax

Team News
Both Fejiri Okenabirhie and Craig Robson are still out after picking up injuries. Luke Guttridge will be looking to build on his fitness following his start last Saturday, as will Paul Benson after coming off the bench against Forest Green Rovers. Williams and Pennell are both still out injured.

Previous Meetings
The Daggers and the Shaymen have met 16 times with Halifax winning six of the meetings and the Daggers winning five. The last time the two teams met the Daggers won 1-0 in 2006.

Tickets

Ticket information for the game can be found here.

Social Media & Online

Follow the Daggers on Twitter for live updates throughout the match (@Dag_RedFC). There will also be updates on our Facebook page (OfficialDaggers). After the match there will be a match report on the website.
